articles.description: For the second straight day, San Diego County has recorded over 400 new COVID-19 cases, health officials announced Saturday.
articles.content:
SAN DIEGO (KGTV and CNS) -- For the second straight day, San Diego County has recorded over 400 new COVID-19 cases, health officials announced Saturday.
